arts.ttl: Bristol Rovers boost survival hopes with win over fellow strugglers Peterborough
arts.sum: James Wilson, Isaac Hutchinson and Ruel Sotiriou struck for the Pirates.

A 2-0 loss at Charlton means Bristol Rovers have lost five of their last seven, and have won only two of their last 11. They did win their last home league outing, beating Barnsley however. Peterboro...
